Entries.Description: Fixed an issue where the Import CSV button on the Getting Started page showed no results
Fix issue of only showing one page of IAM resources in AWS explorer
Removed the nodejs10.x runtime from Lambda deployment dialogs. This runtime has reached end of support. See https://docs.aws.amazon.com/lambda/latest/dg/runtime-support-policy.html for more details.
Added a menu item to submit quick toolkit feedback, available from the "AWS Toolkit" menu, located in the "Extensions" menu ("Tools" menu in Visual Studio 2017)
Lambda ARM Support: Deploy .NET Core 3.1 Lambda ARM functions to AWS Lambda.
Added support for Lambda Custom Runtime (AL2) deployment.
Lambda ARM Support: Deploy Zip-based Node.js 12 Lambda ARM functions to AWS Lambda.
The Toolkit's Getting Started Guide can now be accessed from the "AWS Toolkit" menu, located in the "Extensions" menu ("Tools" menu in Visual Studio 2017)
